name: buggish
description:
____________________________________________________________________________________________________

A little bug simulation game where you can annoy bugs
with your finger.

Your goal is to make a lot of bugs until the apple is rotten.
Be nice or rude.

Controls:
Use your mouse with left click.

____________________________________________________________________________________________________



Bugs can eat



Bugs can avoid you



Bugs can run



Bugs can make love



Bugs can die

____________________________________________________________________________________________________

Spoiler: YOU CAN EARN MULTIPLE TITLES! whoooaa (more than 3)

____________________________________________________________________________________________________

If you enjoyed the game you can support me in a way you feel comfortable with.
(feedback or ratings are super nice and helpful)
(donations via pay-what-you-want will go into my next projects)
